meanings.sent1: The instructions were unclear, so I got confused.
meanings.sent2: The writing on the sign was unclear, making it hard to read.
meanings.sent3: It was unclear whether the cat wanted to go outside or stay in.
meanings.sent4: The path through the forest was unclear, like a maze of trees.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's explanation was unclear, leaving the students puzzled.

meanings.sent1: The image on the old TV was unclear, with fuzzy lines.
meanings.sent2: The memory of the dream was unclear, fading as I woke up.
meanings.sent3: The plan to meet at the park was unclear, causing confusion.
meanings.sent4: The future seemed unclear, like a foggy horizon.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the distant music was unclear, muffled by the wind.
